description: Web fundamentals explain how the web works behind the scenes before writing any code. (Web fundamentals batata hai ki website kaise kaam karti hai - aap code likhne se pehle background me kya hota hai)

topics.title: What is the Internet? (Internet Kya Hai?)
topics.english: The Internet is a global network of computers that communicate with each other using standard protocols.
topics.hinglish: Internet computers ka ek global network hai jo standard rules (protocols) use karke ek dusre se baat karte hain.

practice.question: What is the Internet? (Internet Kya Hai?)
practice.answer: A global network of interconnected computers (Computers ka ek global network jo ek dusre se connected hai)

practice.question: Who controls the Internet? (Internet ka control kis ke paas hai?)
practice.answer: No single entity - it's decentralized (Kisi ek ke paas nahi - ye decentralized hai)

topics.title: What is a Website? (Website Kya Hota Hai?)
topics.english: A website is a collection of web pages hosted on a server and accessed using a browser.
topics.hinglish: Website web pages ka collection hota hai jo server par host hota hai aur browser se access kiya jata hai.

practice.question: Where is a website stored? (Website kahan store hoti hai?)
practice.answer: On a server (Server par)

practice.question: How do we access a website? (Website kaise access karte hain?)
practice.answer: Using a web browser (Web browser ke through)

topics.title: Client vs Server (Client aur Server me Antar)
topics.english: Client requests data and server responds with data.
topics.hinglish: Client data maangta hai aur server data deta hai.

practice.question: What is a client? (Client kya hota hai?)
practice.answer: A device or browser that requests data (Ek device ya browser jo data request karta hai)

practice.question: What is a server? (Server kya hota hai?)
practice.answer: A computer that stores and serves data (Ek computer jo data store karta hai aur serve karta hai)

practice.question: Give an example of client-server interaction (Client-server interaction ka example dijiye)
practice.answer: Loading a webpage - browser requests, server sends HTML/CSS/JS (Webpage load karna - browser request karta hai, server HTML/CSS/JS bhejta hai)

topics.title: What is a Browser? (Browser Kya Hota Hai?)
topics.english: A browser is software that displays websites and interprets HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
topics.hinglish: Browser ek software hota hai jo websites dikhata hai aur HTML, CSS, aur JavaScript ko samajhta hai.

practice.question: Name any two browsers (Koi do browsers ke naam bataiye)
practice.answer: Chrome, Firefox (Chrome, Firefox)

practice.question: What is the main function of a browser? (Browser ka main kaam kya hai?)
practice.answer: To display websites and handle user interaction (Website dikhana aur user interaction handle karna)

topics.title: How Browsers Render Websites (Browser Website Kaise Dikhata Hai)
topics.english: Browsers parse HTML, apply CSS styles, and execute JavaScript to render a webpage.
topics.hinglish: Browser pehle HTML padhta hai, phir CSS styles lagata hai, aur phir JavaScript chalta hai webpage banane ke liye.

practice.question: Which language controls page structure? (Kaunsi language page ka structure control karti hai?)
practice.answer: HTML (HTML)

practice.question: Which language controls design? (Kaunsi language design control karti hai?)
practice.answer: CSS (CSS)

practice.question: Which language controls behavior? (Kaunsi language behavior control karti hai?)
practice.answer: JavaScript (JavaScript)

topics.title: HTTP & HTTPS (HTTP aur HTTPS)
topics.english: HTTP is a protocol for communication between client and server. HTTPS is the secure version.
topics.hinglish: HTTP client aur server ke beech communication ka rule hai. HTTPS iska secure version hai.

practice.question: What does HTTPS provide? (HTTPS kya provide karta hai?)
practice.answer: Secure and encrypted communication (Secure aur encrypted communication)

practice.question: How to identify a secure website? (Secure website kaise pahchane?)
practice.answer: Look for https:// in URL and padlock icon (URL me https:// aur padlock icon dekhe)

topics.title: DNS (Domain Name System) (DNS - Domain Name System)
topics.english: DNS converts domain names into IP addresses.
topics.hinglish: DNS domain name ko IP address me convert karta hai.

practice.question: Why do we need DNS? (Humko DNS ki kya zaroorat hai?)
practice.answer: Computers understand IP addresses, not domain names (Computers IP addresses samajhte hain, domain names nahi)

practice.question: What is a DNS resolver? (DNS resolver kya hota hai?)
practice.answer: A server that translates domain names to IP addresses (Ek server jo domain name ko IP address me badalta hai)

topics.title: Frontend vs Backend (Frontend aur Backend me Antar)
topics.english: Frontend is what users see. Backend handles logic, database, and server operations.
topics.hinglish: Frontend wo hota hai jo user dekhta hai, backend logic aur database handle karta hai.

practice.question: Which side handles database? (Database kaun handle karta hai?)
practice.answer: Backend (Backend)

practice.question: Which side handles user interface? (User interface kaun banata hai?)
practice.answer: Frontend (Frontend)

topics.title: What is a Full Stack Developer? (Full Stack Developer Kya Hota Hai?)
topics.english: A full stack developer works on both frontend and backend.
topics.hinglish: Full stack developer frontend aur backend dono pe kaam karta hai.

practice.question: Is MERN a full stack? (Kya MERN full stack hai?)
practice.answer: Yes (Haan)

practice.question: What does a full stack developer do? (Full stack developer kya karta hai?)
practice.answer: Works on both frontend and backend of a website (Website ka frontend aur backend dono banata hai)

topics.title: How Websites are Hosted (Website Hosting Kaise Hoti Hai)
topics.english: Hosting stores website files on a server so users can access them online.
topics.hinglish: Hosting website files ko server par store karta hai taaki users online access kar saken.

practice.question: Why do websites need hosting? (Website ko hosting ki kya zaroorat hai?)
practice.answer: To be accessible on the internet (Internet par accessible hone ke liye)

practice.question: Where does hosting happen? (Hosting kahan hoti hai?)
practice.answer: On a server (Server par)
